altername_name: Zut Alors! II: Ze Missing Musketeers
name: Zut Alors! 2
overview: Zut Alors II is the second shareware, text-only adventure in which you play the part of Cyrano de Bergerbar, a young blade who has recently arrived in Paris with a burning ambition to join the King's Musketeers like his idols Athos, Porthos, Aramis and D'Artagnan. This he has now achieved, and the second adventure takes up a few months after the first ended. Cyrano has now found better lodgings near the Musketeers' HQ and has acquired a dim but loyal servant named LePlank. The only black cloud on his otherwise bright horizon is the fact that his girlfriend Constance has left him. Beyond that, the actual plot of the game will become clear as you play it...
